section.para: This manual is written in XML using a slightly enhanced version of the DocBook 5 XML DTD, using PHP's very own DocBook rendering system PhD.
This guide explains the general structure, layout, and conventions used in the PEAR manual. The manual is divided into six main parts, they are:

listitem.para: General information about developing and releasing PEAR-Packages.

This section contains documentation about the core PEAR classes. These core components are the base to every PEAR class and understanding the basics will allow general use of the PEAR library. Topics include the &class.pear; base, PEAR administration, error handling through use of the &class.pear-error; object, and system commands. These classes are generally shipped with every source PHP distribution.
